groupPreChallengeReviewId.description: A group pre-challenge review (GPCR) is an option offered by the Valuation Office Agency (VOA) to groups of property occupiers, owners or ratepayers of business and other non-domestic properties. It allows them to challenge the basis of the valuation in respect of local, regional or national schemes of valuation.

declaration.description: I declare that the information I have given is correct. If the information provided during a challenge is incorrect, this could lead to a penalty. The rateable value could also change, leading to a backdated business rates bill.
